# Results

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(tm)
library(wordcloud)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(tidytext)
library(stringi)
library(qdapDictionaries)
```

```{r}
# import data
app_user_clean = read.csv("output/app_user_clean.csv")
app_type = read.csv("output/app_type.csv")
WhyPay = read.csv("output/WhyPay.csv")

app_user_clean = app_user_clean %>% 
  mutate(
    HH.Income = fct_relevel(
      HH.Income,
      "0 - 10,000",
      "10,001 - 20,000",
      "20,001 - 40,000",
      "40,001 - 60,000",
      "60,001 - 80,000",
      "80,001 - 100,000",
      "100,001 - 150,000",
      "150,001 - 200,000",
      "200,001 - 300,000",
      "300,001 - 450,000",
      "Over 450,000"))
```
